content.rendered:
This FREE guide will teach you how to…

  • Call Codefresh pipelines from Jenkins Jobs (and vice versa),

  • Migrate from Jenkins to Codefresh including freestyle jobs, pipelines, shared libraries, and credentials,

  • Build, run, and push Docker images,

  • Migrate Jenkins pipelines that deploy to Kubernetes.
